remarks.remarks: (Lakhipur - The infrastructure damage of the concerned department caused due to roadside bum soil erosion)
(Sonapur - Due to heavy rain waterlogging took place at Helagog, Bhogpur, Barkhat, Amerigog NC, Maloibari, Sonapur, Digaru.)
(Donkamokam - Number of affected person may increase, if it rains continues till midnight and release of Dam water)

(Narayanpur - As per report from BDO Narayanpur one earthen peripheral bund about 20 mtrs breached at Durpang river, As per report from Divisional Officer , Lakhimpur Soil Conservation  40 metre of boulder revetment work damaged due to backfilling of earth work), (North Lakhimpur - As per the report received from PWD Roads, Lakhimpur, the left bank of the Ronganodi Embankment, along with the hume pipe culvert, has sustained partial structural damage due to heavy and incessant rainfall near Durga Mandir, Lakhimpur

As per report received from BEEO, Lakhimpur Education Block, due to heavy and incessant rainfall, Kaliyani Kalyanpur LPS under Ghunasuti cluster is submerged. , Water Pouch Distribution by PHE 10300 nos.), (Kadam - As reported by the concerned ADO on 31/05/2025)
(Kampur - Due to Rising water level of River Barpani 27 Nos of villages crop area affected as reported by LRAs under Kampur Revenue Circle.)

(Mankachar - As per report received from i/cExecutive Engineer (PHE), South Salmara Mankachar Division, Hatsingimari 2 Nos. scheme has been damaged due to heavy rain fall on 21-05-2025., As per the report received from the District Agriculture Officer, South Salmara Mankachar, 1.5 hectares of crop area has been submerged due to flash flood by the Kaloo River on 31-05-2025.)
